name: Spell Simulator
description:
Hi everyone , this game of mine  compled less than  24h hours in AI APP HACKATHON  organized by DeepHub with theme is create app using AI technology and in this game , you can use your voice to charater launch the skills

We have 4 basic command for 4 skills

1.Fire
2.Freeze
3.Teleport
4.Impossible

Try using your voice and say them 

If charater not launch skill because my API can be break , sorry

You can press Num Left : 1 ,2 3 , 4 for test skills
